publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 3
ab.l: Miźmoru David́niń qačḥanynda alnyndan Abšolomnun uvlu- nun.
E H ńe ḱopt́urĺar tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarim ḱopĺar turadyrlar üśt́uḿa.
Ḱopĺar ajtadyrlar ǯanym üč́uń joḥtur jarlyɣaš anar Teń- rid́ań hamḿeš́a.
Da śeń e H qalqan ḿeniḿ ašyra syjym da ḱot́uŕuv́č́um bašymny.
Avazym byla H-ɣa čaɣyramyn da qaruv b́eŕadir maja aziź tavyndan hamḿeš́a.
Ḿeń jattym da ojandym qozɣaldym ki H kipĺar ḿeni.
Qorḥmam- ḿeń t́uḿańĺarińd́ań ulusnun ki č́uv́ŕa qojsalar üśt́uḿa.

Turɣun
e H jarlyɣašlaɣyn ḿeni e Teńrim kertid́ań qyrdyj bar dušmanlarymny jajaḥ- qa tišĺariń rašaʿlarnyn syndyrdyj.
H-dan ol jarlyɣaš ulusuj üś- t́uńa algyšyj śeniń hamḿeš́a.

app.note: It looks like a kaf at the initial position that was corrected to qof later.
